ogDescription: Yamadera’s sub-temples dot the slopes of Mt. Hoshu northeast of Yamagata City. A 1,000-step ascent through a mystical forest brings you to a mountaintop temple complex—Yamadera—with a view considered among the best in northern Japan.
ogTitle: Risshakuji Temple (Yamadera) | Travel Japan - Japan National Tourism Organization (Official Site)
author: Japan National Tourism Organization
